document_data.name: Castle Waterdeep
document_data.mainbody: '''Castle Waterdeep''' was a castle located in the city of [[Waterdeep]]. It was the seat of the city's government.
document_data.Interior: Most of the castle's passageways were permanently lit by ''[[continual light]]'' spells.
document_data.Supplies: The castle held enough food to feed 50,000 people for ten days, and could accommodate up to 540 prisoners in 90 cells. There were many dungeons beneath the castle, mainly used for storage, which linked through to the [[Citadel of the Bloody Hand]], creating a security concern. There were also deep wells beneath the castle that provided clean drinking water.
document_data.Personnel: The castle was garrisoned by 1,400 of the [[City Guard (Waterdeep)|City Guard]], who, along with members of the [[City Watch (Waterdeep)|City Watch]], were trained in its courtyard. Seventy [[Horse#Terms|warhorses]] were kept in the castle stables. Thirty guards were always armed and keeping watch on the battlements, while twenty crossbowmen and two wizards were always on duty in a guardroom close to the castle gates.
document_data.Activities: The battlements of Castle Waterdeep were used for the hanging of non-nobles.
